title: Strategy of Elimination
text: To eliminate variables, subtract the second equation from the first equation to remove the $$y^2$$ term.

title: Expression in terms of $$y$$
text: What is the resulting expression in terms of only $$x$$ after simplifying?

title: Value of $$y$$
text: To solve for the value of $$y$$, substitute the values of $$x$$ into the equations.

title: Positive and Negative
text: Make sure to account for both the positive and negative answer when taking the square root.
